alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:27PM AKDT until July 07 at 8:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands in Alaska... * Until 800 PM AKDT. * At 727 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 36 miles northeast of Twelvemile Summit, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
